title._content: Image taken from page 10 of 'La Mer Libre du Pole ... Traduit de l'Anglais et accompagné de notes ... par F. de Lanoye. Ouvrage illustré de 70 gravures, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "La Mer Libre du Pole ... Traduit de l'Anglais et accompagné de notes ... par F. de Lanoye. Ouvrage illustré de 70 gravures, etc" Author: HAYES, Isaac Israel. Contributor: TUGNOT DE LANOYE, Ferdinand. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10460.f.16." Page: 10 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1868 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001625720 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
